titles.title: To liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of digital still image video cameras.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/27/2012--Introduced. Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of digital still image video cameras.
